Detailed Description

Abstract interface of a calibration kit which can create calibration objects.

create calibration object.

Parameters:
module_type_col_name the name of the conditions data collection with the module types.
module_calibration_col_name the name of the conditions data collection which contains the calibration constants. FIXME: There should be a better method to hand parameters to Calibration objects.

Implemented in CALICE::CaliceEcalCalibrationKit, ConstantCalibrationKit, and NoOpCalibrationKit.
